 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָטֵב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָטֹב‎</span> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 31</sup>] **verb** ==be moist== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ra‰âbu***</u></abbr>, II. ***moisten***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְטַב‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all ***be moist***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִזֶּרֶם הָרִים יִרְטָ֑בוּ‎</span> [[Job.24.8|Job 24:8]].
